RelatedSentence: Police said six other people also suffered injuries after six cars and two lorries collided at around 4.25 pm on Monday .
Police said six other people also suffered injuries after six cars and two lorries collided at around 4.25 pm on Monday .
A Police Scotland spokeswoman said the road would remain closed while emergency teams continue to work at the scene .
Motorists are facing major delays because of the closure .
The accident happened near the pedestrian ramp to Waverley Station , a Police Scotland spokeswoman said .
